item.description: å‚è€ƒ è®©ååº”å †ç”µæ»¡äº†åœï¼Œæ²¡ç”µäº†å¼€ local br = peripheral.wrap('back') while true do local raio = br.battery().stored() / br.battery().capacity() local of = br.active() print('power', raio) if (raio < 0.2) then if (of == false) then br.setActive(true) print('open') end elseif (raio > 0.8) then if (of == true) then br.setActive(false) print('close') end end os.sleep(1) end ã€‚
